metadata.title: CVE-2017-7378 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The PoDoFo::PdfPainter::ExpandTabs function in PdfPainter.cpp in PoDoFo0.9.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-basedbuffer over-read and application crash) via a crafted PDF document.

criterions.comment: libpodofo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
